target.name: Sect1
target.text: Set Access to the Zone Workspace

target.name: Sect2
target.text: To change the default access to the zone workspace:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the zone-workspace page, click the Manage toolbar item and choose This workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the zone-workspace page, click the Manage toolbar item and choose This workspace.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the "Manage access control" section of the page, click Set workspace access control.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Visitors column, deselect the Anonymous users option to disable anonymous access.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Remove selected groups from roles.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Specify the Outgoing E-Mail Server

target.name: Sect2
target.text: To specify the outgoing e-mail server:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the zone-management page (Manage > This Workspace), select Manage outgoing e-mail settings in the Manage e-mail settings section.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the zone-management page (Manage > This Workspace), select Manage outgoing e-mail settings in the Manage e-mail settings section.

target.name: Step
target.text: Specify the name of the computer that runs the outgoing SMTP e-mail server software.

target.name: Step
target.text: Change the default port number if necessary.

target.name: Step
target.text: Enter a default "from" e-mail address.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Enable E-mail Notifications

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the discussion forum, access the Tools toolbar option, and then click Administration.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the discussion forum, access the Tools toolbar option, and then click Administration.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the E-mail operations section, click Set e-mail notification schedule.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the "Set notification message content level" section, click the Send titles only or the Send titles and summaries radio button.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the "Set the mail notification schedule" section, click the checkboxes of the days on which Forum is to send notifications.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the same section, specify the time Forum is to send notifications. The times that you specify apply to each day that you selected. Use 24-hour format, and separate the hour value from the minute value using a colon ( : ).

target.name: Step
target.text: You can add users to the distribution list. Users can also enable their own notifications from the discussion forum by choosing Set notification from the Tools menu as described in the user Help system.

target.name: Step
target.text: At the bottom of the form, click OK.
